title: Sweetheart Rakan and Xayah, Up for sale in 2020 Valentines Day?
body:
Hey!!
Was wondering if Sweetheart Rakan And Xayah would be unlocked for purchase in Feb 14, Valentines Day in 2020. 
My boyfriend and I are having a little contest for who would buy the skins first hehe. Thanks!!
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
